title: on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department public expenditure national development plan delivery reform) order 2024

title: on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27
heading: 2. Gillian Clarke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Gillian Clarke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform, is appointed as Special Adviser to Ossian Smyth, Minister 
of State at the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform, with effect from 16 May 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

2 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [351] 3
